page.title: 07INDUSTRY:THE TOURIST TRADE
page.content: Tourism is one of the most important industries in our area .Looe has lots of holiday accommodation,cafes & gift shops.There are four,large caravan parks in our block.They have a mixture of caravans on site for hire,and spaces for touring caravans and tents. We visited the Tourist Information Bureau at Looe.We learned that most visitors to the Looe area come from the North and the Midlands,but many come from other parts of Britain.There are also many foreign tourists.The Bureau was visited in 1984 by 320 French,266 Germans,220 Americans,126 Australians,125 Dutch,41 Swedish,30 Danish,26 Canadians,25 Norwegians,10 Spanish,8 Singaporeans,6 South Africans & 1 Japanese.This year there are more Americans so far. We discovered these statistics about two of the caravan parks: (cont.P.8)
